text: Morning guys, does the dev addon work with Firefox?

The community built developer chrome extension is not available for firefox right now.

It does work in other chromium based browsers.

If you would like to help make it work in firefox you can do that, an issue exists here: <https://github.com/TheWebTech/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/issues/51>
i swear that i am going to get that firefox extension up and running.  makes no sense that it doesnt work what is clearly the best browser out there :slightly_smiling_face: .
